9.title: Twas the Game Night Before Christmas

1.plot: Jane Lynch is joined by Jason Alexander, Valerie Bertinelli, Martin Short, Beth Behrs, Lester Holt, and Julie Bowen.

1.title: Veep vs. The Walking Dead
1.plot: In hopes of winning the $25,000 grand prize, two contestants lead teams of three celebrities, including Tony Hale, Anna Chlumsky, Matt Walsh, Christian Serratos, Josh McDermitt and Lauren Cohan, in a series of unique party games.

imdb.plot outline: Each week two people leave their ordinary lives behind as they and a group of popular celebrities gather together to play a series of outrageous and hilarious party games that include quizzes featuring celebrity and popular culture. The civilians compete with each other, but each person has a team of celebrities for assistance, vying for the opportunity to take home a $25,000 cash prize. Adding to the party atmosphere is the host -- award-winning actress, comic and singer Jane Lynch -- and an energetic house band.
imdb.title: Hollywood Game Night
plot: Features two contestants, each with a team of celebrity guests, competing in pop culture party games for a chance to win $25,000.

Each week two people leave their ordinary lives behind as they and a group of popular celebrities gather together to play a series of outrageous and hilarious party games that include quizzes featuring celebrity and popular culture. The civilians compete with each other, but each person has a team of celebrities for assistance, vying for the opportunity to take home a $25,000 cash prize. Adding to the party atmosphere is the host -- award-winning actress, comic and singer 'Jane Lynch' (qv) -- and an energetic house band.::Jwelch5742
